title: #132 - Andrew Yang
description: On this episode of The H3 Podcast we are joined by democratic presidential primary candidate Andrew Yang! Together we discuss the threat of automation and AI, people being politically disengaged, gun control, debating Trump, and a whole lot more!
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
itunes:subtitle: On this episode of The H3 Podcast we are joined by democratic presidential primary candidate Andrew Yang! Together we discuss the threat of automation and AI, people being politically disengaged, gun control, debating Trump, and a whole lot more!
